H0.text: factories that assemble parts made in other countries. Free Trade Areas

H1.text: factories that assemble parts made in other countries. Export Processing Zones

H2.text: factories that assemble parts made in other countries. Industrial Parks

H3.text: factories that assemble parts made in other countries. special economic zones

A4.text: a party to a free trade area has the incentive to use inputs originating in another party so that their products may qualify for originating status

A5.text: normally inputs originating in one FTA party will be considered as originating in the other party if they are incorporated in the manufacturing process in that other party
